properties.areaDesc: Dunkirk to Buffalo NY; Ripley to Dunkirk NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 6:41PM EST until January 11 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds to 20 to 30
knots expected. For the Gale Watch, southwest winds to 35 knots
and waves 8 to 11 feet possible.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Erie from Ripley to
Buffalo.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 1 AM to 3 PM EST
Saturday. For the Gale Watch, from late Saturday night through
Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 3 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
